name: Hypercalcemia
description:
Fall Game Jam Skelly Game, using spooky scary skeletons, and only 3 colors.

Shoot blood from your eyes to attack your enemies, but be careful, the blood is also what's keeping you alive. Pick back up the blood of your enemies and drink it down to keep you going.

Pumpkins guarantee a health drop, but do major damage if they touch you. Ghosts pop out of tombstones and scare you (dodge the "boo") and vampire bats circle around before divebombing.

The team was composed of UAT students participating in the UAT Game Workshop Jam of Fall 2022, for some of us it was our first or second jam, and our first or second time completing a game project.
